divs: Sighting DetailsWas driving North down Keeney Street, just past Bushy Hill Road in Manchester and noticed what looked like a flare in the sky. It was overcast and no stars could be seen. I rolled down the window to get a better look and saw that it was 4 glowing lights in a diamond shape. I was driving about 35-40 mph and the lights we traveling approx. northeast and a bit slower. I realized then I had no idea what this was because there was no sound. Not sure how high it was flying, but just below the clouds. I slowed down to turn onto Briarwood Drive to stop and get a better look. When I got out the lights kept moving then disappeared into the cloud cover. While driving I used my iPhone to capture video of the 4 lights. I also noticed other people witnessing the same 4 lights.
trends: There have been 14 other sightings in Manchester
There were no other sightings in Manchester on or around January 28th 2011
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: 4 glowing orange/red lights in the sky moving slowly
